about_the_game:
• Navigate maze-like levels, solve 100+ puzzles, and uncover the story of what (or who) broke your world
  • Lean on and utilize the unique abilities of 4 different characters
  • Experience a story that takes a unique and personal look at the stigma surrounding mental health by showing it through the lens of personal growth
  • Original, atmospheric score
  • Abstract/minimalistic art style


After the world shatters, your direction becomes unclear. Through these broken paths, conquer obstacles, hazards, and puzzles with your new-found ability to flip the world. Piece together what remains by relying on the friends you encounter along the way and taking advantage of their strengths to find where your own truly lie. Reveal the truth, take back control, and reconcile with who you are -- or what you've become.
